derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French épaulette, diminutive of épaule 'shoulder', from Latin spatula in the late Latin sense 'shoulder blade'

entry.tran: （某些制服上的）肩饰;（尤指军装上的）肩章
entry.def: Epaulettes are decorations worn on the shoulders of certain uniforms, especially military ones.

means.word_mean: 1. adornment consisting of an ornamental cloth pad worn on the shoulder
